name: Gloriosa (Elder Nyon)
text: On Play: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Amazon Lily} or {Kuja Pirates} type card other than [Gloriosa (Elder Nyon)] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Amazon Lily} or {Kuja Pirates} type card other than [Gloriosa (Elder Nyon)] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
